title: "Working Directory Demo"
author: "Jessica Helmer"
date: "2025-10-02"
output: html_document
---

My file structure: 

```
Documents/PSYC2020L
├── PSYC2020L.Rproj
└── labs
    ├── Lab 7 - NHST I
    |   └──r4ds.jpg
    └── Lab 8 - NHST II
        ├── test.Rmd
        └── R.png
```

```{r}
getwd()
here::here()
```

#### Getting `R` Picture
```{r, out.height=200, out.width=200}
knitr::include_graphics("R.png")
```

```{r, out.height=200, out.width=200}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("labs", "Lab 8 - NHST II", "R.png"))
```

#### Getting `r4ds` Picture
```{r}
knitr::include_graphics("../Lab 7 - NHST I/r4ds.jpg")
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("labs", "Lab 7 - NHST I", "r4ds.jpg"))
```
